text: this is amateur footage of the
earthquake hitting a supermarket in the
capital Quito as the shelves shake and
pots smashed to the floor it shows just
how violent the quake was and yet this
effect was still more than a hundred and
seventy kilometers from the epicenter
which hit on the coast in the northeast
of the country
once the 7.8 magnitude earthquake hit
reports of damage started to come in
pictures on social media revealed just
how widespread it might be in Guayaquil
much further to the southeast an
overpass collapsed rescue workers
rushing to the scene there was also a
tsunami warning as authorities started
to report on the death toll and ask
people to stay away from coastal areas
we are continuing to receive information
from the national system regarding
health during this regrettable loss of
life the numbers still need to be
confirmed the entire public force is in
a state of maximum alert to protect
lives of citizens there reports the town
of Morez near near the epicenter has
been affected as well and as the hours
go by the true extent of the damage and
the death toll in Ecuador will only
become clearer Regin armored BBC news
